title: Let's Talk - Dad/Daughter Q & A Series - Part 2

media:group.media:title: Let's Talk - Dad/Daughter Q & A Series - Part 2
media:group.media:description: What has caused your daughter the most pain? What events or issues have made her mourn or shut down? It might even be from something you have said or done, dad. On this week’s live discussion, Drs. Ken & Michelle talk further about how a dad can engage his daughter in those sensitive areas and help bring healing to her life. Dad, you can lead her to “Lament” in positive ways. Tune in and chime in with your feedback.
